<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:cbscommon="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>common structure of header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="SecurityInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="LoginSystemCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is request system code which is defined in CBS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="RemoteIP" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OperatorInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The operator ID which is defined in both CBS system and request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ChannelID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is channel ID which the operator belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OwnershipInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BEID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Entity ID which the customer belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BRID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Region ID which the customer belongs to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>message header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BusinessCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Business operation code from request system (For example: function code in CRM system).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MessageSeq" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique sequence number for one message. If request system resend a message, this field should be unchanged. For example: CRM can use "OrderID + OrderNodeID" as this field.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OwnershipInfo" type="cbscommon:OwnershipInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="AccessSecurity" type="cbscommon:SecurityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is for security authentication for request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatorInfo" type="cbscommon:OperatorInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It indicates the operator information of the request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AccessMode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="MsgLanguageCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is used to specify the language of description in returen message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TimeFormat" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TimeType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TimeZoneID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdditionalProperty" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Reserved for future extention</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>0: success Other values: failure code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MsgLanguageCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is used to specify the language of description in returen message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultDesc" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The brief description of result code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdditionalProperty" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Reserved for future extention</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:common="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/common" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for appUser information use(add,modify,delete)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Message command ID. OCS provide special value according special interface)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Version ID,current version is 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Transaction ID,used to compound session, default null (CRM is always null)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Sequence ID,used to compound session,default 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*valid to compound session, default value is None, enumerate values as follows: Event, not compound session type Start, session begin Continue,session continue Stop, session stop. (CRM is always Event)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Event" id="Event"/> <xs:enumeration value="Start" id="Start"/> <xs:enumeration value="Continue" id="Continue"/> <xs:enumeration value="Stop" id="Stop"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SessionEntity" type="common:SessionEntityType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for security use it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterFrom" is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currentCell" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The current cell of calling Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="additionInfo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>addition information it is optional if bank then bankcode if SP then Spcode</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ThirdPartyID" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:common="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/common" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for appUser information use(add,modify,delete)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Message command ID. OCS provide special value according special interface)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Version ID,current version is 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Transaction ID,used to compound session, default null (CRM is always null)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Sequence ID,used to compound session,default 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*valid to compound session, default value is None, enumerate values as follows: Event, not compound session type Start, session begin Continue,session continue Stop, session stop. (CRM is always Event)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Event" id="Event"/> <xs:enumeration value="Start" id="Start"/> <xs:enumeration value="Continue" id="Continue"/> <xs:enumeration value="Stop" id="Stop"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SessionEntity" type="common:SessionEntityType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for security use it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterFrom" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>the source of interface: 4050000 for BSS 4050001 for Bank 4050002 for SP ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterMode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The mode of interface 4050000 for Face to Face 4050001 for Website 4050002 for IVR ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterMedi" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Interaction Media if Website then give URL if IVR then give access number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="visitArea" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>visit area Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currentCell" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The current cell of calling Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="additionInfo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>addition information it is optional if bank then bankcode if SP then Spcode</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ThirdPartyID" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 1 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reserve2" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 2 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reserve3" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 3 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of the partner when the session is generated by carrier it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system operator id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TradePartnerID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of partner when the session is generated by partner it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerOperID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner operaor id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BelToAreaID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>belong to area it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SerialNo" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system request serial number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Remark" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The remark information about this operation, it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ResultCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates a code of success/failure, failure reasons. 405000000: success Other values: failure reasons</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultDesc" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SessionEntityType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="RemoteAddress" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:common="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/common" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for appUser information use(add,modify,delete)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Message command ID. OCS provide special value according special interface)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Version ID,current version is 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Transaction ID,used to compound session, default null (CRM is always null)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Sequence ID,used to compound session,default 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*valid to compound session, default value is None, enumerate values as follows: Event, not compound session type Start, session begin Continue,session continue Stop, session stop. (CRM is always Event)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Event" id="Event"/> <xs:enumeration value="Start" id="Start"/> <xs:enumeration value="Continue" id="Continue"/> <xs:enumeration value="Stop" id="Stop"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SessionEntity" type="common:SessionEntityType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for security use it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterFrom" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>the source of interface: 4050000 for BSS 4050001 for Bank 4050002 for SP ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterMode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The mode of interface 4050000 for Face to Face 4050001 for Website 4050002 for IVR ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterMedi" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Interaction Media if Website then give URL if IVR then give access number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="visitArea" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>visit area Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currentCell" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The current cell of calling Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="additionInfo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>addition information it is optional if bank then bankcode if SP then Spcode</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ThirdPartyID" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 1 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reserve2" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 2 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reserve3" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 3 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of the partner when the session is generated by carrier it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system operator id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TradePartnerID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of partner when the session is generated by partner it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerOperID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner operaor id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BelToAreaID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>belong to area it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SerialNo" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system request serial number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Remark" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The remark information about this operation, it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ResultCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates a code of success/failure, failure reasons. 405000000: success Other values: failure reasons</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultDesc" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SessionEntityType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="RemoteAddress" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

value="4050000" id="Male"/> <xs:enumeration value="4050001" id="Female"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Paymode"> <xs:annotation>
